entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 03:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023
